title: BCC: Build on fall in youth unemployment with compulsory work experience (Lincolnshire Chamber of Commerce) ...
text: ( Source : Lincolnshire Chamber of Commerce ) In the three months from June to August 2015 , employment was up 140, 000 , and unemployment was down 79,000 The employment rate is at its highest since 1971 Youth unemployment rate fell markedly to
